EntitySets.Name: UserAssignments
EntitySets.Description: Collection of user assignments for item assignment and user information updates

Properties.Name: itemID
Properties.Description: Unique identifier for the learning item

Properties.Name: assignmentDate
Properties.Description: Date when the item was assigned

Properties.Name: label
Properties.Description: Label that appears for approvers to know which choice they are making

Properties.Name: comment_required
Properties.Description: Whether approver is required to enter a comment when making this choice
